roleset.name: meet with, have a conference with
roleset.note: CONFER-V NOTES: Updated by Julia (from confer.01-v)
CONFERENCE-N NOTES: Roleset based on instances in ula-masc1-rest, comparison to meet.03. No corresponding VN class. (from conference.01-n)

example.name: high-level summit
example.text: [Three top advisers to Mr. Davis]-1 visited New York late last week, at least in part *trace*-1 to confer with executives at Citicorp.

example.name: All participants in one mention, within LVC
example.text: I think , actually , they were your words when we had the telephone conference.

example.name: Meeting participants in separate constituents
example.text: The following tips will help parents before, during and after their conference with their child's teacher.

roleset.name: grant, give, convey
roleset.note: CONFER-V NOTES: Frames file for 'confer' based on sentences in financial subcorpus andautomatic expansion via verbnet. (from confer.02-v predicate notes)

example.name: bestow
example.text: He confers big trading commissions on Wall Street firms.

example.name: all arg
example.text: The acquisition of knowledge does not confer wealth on a person.
